description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen called TransactionsScreen, which displays a list of financial transactions. It initializes data fetching on load, observes a TransactionProvider for state management, and navigates to transaction details when a transaction is tapped.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of transactions with loading indicator and navigation to transaction details.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the lifecycle and UI for TransactionsScreen, fetching data on init and building the widget tree.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Overrides the initState method to fetch transactions asynchronously after widget creation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, displaying a loading indicator or list of transactions based on provider state.
